title: When 'Organisms' is given as the keyword, it returns "Organizations". Please note that this happens under normal step and configuration environment.
description: When 'Organisms' is given as the keyword, it returns "Organizations". Not sure why this happens. It uses standard search handler.

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: This is a user question about configuration of stemming analysis.  Please ask on the solr-user list.
